title: Restitution
context: [ยง431:2-404] Restitution. Any person convicted under this part shall be ordered by a court to make restitution to any insurer, person, or licensee for any financial loss sustained by that insurer, person, or licensee that was caused by the act or acts for which the person was convicted. [L 2009, c 149, pt of ยง2]
